It cannot be renewed from within Argentina, but you can apply for a different visa type if you wish to stay longer."}]]}],["$","$L2a","1",{"value":"item-1","children":[["$","$L2b",null,{"children":"Can I bring my family?"}],["$","$L2c",null,{"children":"Family members can apply for accompanying visas. Overstaying can result in fines and entry bans. You can reapply for a new Digital Nomad Visa after spending time outside Argentina."}]]}]]}]]}]}]}]
